## Chess.addHeader() method

Adds a PGN header entry

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addHeader(key: string, val: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string |  |
|  val | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example


```js
chess.addHeader('White', 'Robert James Fischer')
chess.addHeader('Black', 'Mikhail Tal')

```
